headlines.description: Goals from Mohamed Salah and Sadio Mane helped a nervy Liverpool overturn a one goal deficit and beat Bournemouth 2-1 on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool three wins away from winning title

headlines.description: Arsenal withstood sustained pressure from West Ham to win 1-0 at the Emirates on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lacazette nets in Arsenal win over West Ham

headlines.description: Crystal Palace extended their winning run in the Premier League and moved into the top half of the standings with a 1-0 win over Watford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Palace move up to 10th with win over Watford

headlines.description: A bullet header from Billy Sharp gave Sheffield United a 1-0 win over bottom side Norwich City to lift the Blades to sixth place.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sheffield United go sixth with win over Norwich

headlines.description: Newcastle United leapfrogged Southampton in the Premier League standings and moved up to 13th with a 1-0 win at St Mary's Stadium.
headlines.shortLinkText: Saint-Maximin magic gives Newcastle win at So'ton

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Wolverhampton Wanderers

headlines.description: Wolverhampton Wanderers' Premier League top-four ambitions stalled as they were held to a 0-0 draw at home by struggling Brighton & Hove Albion.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wolves drop points against dogged Brighton

headlines.description: Tottenham Hotspur avoided a third straight Premier League defeat, coming back from a Chris Wood goal to earn a 1-1 draw at Burnley.
headlines.shortLinkText: Alli penalty earns Spurs 1-1 draw at Burnley
